Description: Business Transformation Manager / Consultant - 6 Month Renewable Contract Dubai.eMagine Solutions have been retained by a global multinational giant. the company has over 100,000 employees globally and are undergoing a business transformation in the Africa region. Based in their office in Dubai you will work on a transformation program focused around the commercial and operational lines of the business.We are seeking a strong consultant with excellent stake holder management and change management experience. You should be comfortable with dealing with CxO and Director level and advising and challenging on business processes such as Go To Market (GTM), Business Development / Commercialization, Strategy and Delivery.Candidates can come from either a business consultancy, management consultancy or global in-house practice (MNC).For immediate consideration please apply today.Skills
Skills: Suitable candidates must have experience working as a Process Analyst/ Business Analyst with strong process mapping, process improvement experience around systems, processes, commercial strategy and business development for new and existing market expansion.
